head.supplied: 30/6/89 ¶ ¶ With the present post, esteemed Professor, I am sending you two parcels of algae that Miss Lodder has collected at the mouth of the Leven River in north Tasmania at ¶ my request ¶ . This...

p.seg: Mit jetziger Post, geehrter Herr Prof., sende ich Ihnen 2 packete

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

p.seg: Algen, welche Miss Lodder an der Mündung des Leven-Flusses in Nord-Tasmanien auf
gesammelt hat. Diese junge Dame wünsch

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

p.seg: von den numerirten Exemplaren nur die Namen; von den andern wünscht sie, soweit solche von den numerirten verschieden sind, ein Stück benannt zurück. Sie will weiter sammeln. Die Localität ist neu.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: With the present post, esteemed Professor, I am sending you two parcels of algae that Miss Lodder has collected at the mouth of the Leven River in north Tasmania at my request . This young lady wants only the names of the numbered specimens; of the others she wants, as far as they are different from the numbered ones, a named specimen back. She will continue collecting. The locality is new.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
